column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////Pork belly and loin skewer: The weakest dish of the night. I'm pretty certain the skewer came with only loin cuts
column2: which were extremely tough and dry. The sauce that came on the side alleviated the dryness
column3: but I really would've preferred to see a sauce that was made for the dish than what seemed to be a generic dollop of mayonnaise-type sauce that was also used for the scallop empanadas.
